Posts.Content: Hi  I have just been diagnosed with Metastatic breast cancer and have started xeloda (capecitabine) so far no side effects.. fingers crossed that continues : ) but I just wondered if there is anyone else out there in the same/simular situation?! I was 23 when I was first diagnosed with Breast cancer which responded well to treatment however I had local recurrance last year later which once again appeared to respond but now its back again...  be good to get any advice, alternative suggestions or generally anything that may have helped you or is helping you Rachel x
Posts.Title: 26 and have Metastatic Breast Cancer to Lung
